icon_berserk.componentleveltooltip: This Character has gone Berserk and cannot be controlled.

icon_unruly.componentleveltooltip: This unit has disobeyed your orders, charging without command!

icon_awaiting_order.componentleveltooltip: This unit has rallied and is awaiting new orders!

rank_image.comment: ScottB: Hides self if unit card gets scaled down to avoid overlap with label_num_entities

ability_anim_holder.comment: Scottb: Holds ability_activated_anims when ability cast on us (these are created by code)
